news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Landlord-Tenant Law Center
news.description: Both tenants and landlords want rentals to run smoothly. The risk of unpleasant surprises recedes if each side understands their rights and obligations. The Landlord-Tenant Law Center in the Justia Legal Guides helps serve this purpose.
